Can you throw a school-wide assembly online? Absolutely.
“LiveDifferent has mastered online assemblies! They have figured out how to provide the feel of an in-person assembly via a virtual presentation. The student engagement was through the roof!“
Guidance Counsellor, Grant Park High School, Winnipeg MB
Reserve your livestream/online assembly for 2021/22!
LiveDifferent is one of Canada’s leading motivational presenters, speaking to over 1.6 million students over the past 20 years.
We are now offering our innovative online “Circles” assemblies, livestreamed to middle/high schools (grades 6-12).
A Circles Assembly includes:
Live host/presenter School-wide student interaction Impactful personal stories Live panel of student leaders Dynamic video content
Topics to choose from:
Authenticity Empathy Growth Mindset Resilience Altruism (Kindness) Values and Priorities
Cost: $500 (unlimited classrooms/students per event)
Learn more about Circles assemblies
Questions? Book a 15 min discovery call
LiveDifferent is a registered charity organization #861232890 RR0001. 100% of proceeds from school assemblies and youth programs will be used to help support our charitable mission to empower and engage youth in a lifestyle of compassion and service.
